channel.title: Tianjin Explosion
channel.description:
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XZa48XG7NNM[/youtube]
Size of explosion [img]http://maps.google.com/maps/api/staticmap?size=600x500&path=fillcolor:0x00FF00%7Cweight:1%7Ccolor:0xFFFFFF%7Cenc:%7DwomFussmUTeX%60AcXjByWvCoW%60E_WjFkVpGuUxHyT%7CI%7DS%60K%7BRbLwQ%60MoP~MeOzN%7BMrOkLhPyJzPgIlQsGxQ_FdReDjRqBpRw@rR?nRv@lRpBbRdDzQ~EjQrG%7CPfIhPxJpOjLzNzM~MdObMnPbLvQ%60KzR%7CI%7CSxHxTpGtUjFjV~D~VvCnWlBxW~@bXTdXUfX_A%60XmBxWwCnW_E~VkFjVqGtUyHxT%7DI%7CSaKzRcLvQcMnP_NfO%7BNxMqOjLiPxJ%7DPhIkQrG%7BQ%7CEcRfDmRnBoRv@sR?qRw@kRoBeRgDyQ%7DEmQsG%7BPiIiPyJsOkL%7BNyM_NgOaMoPcLwQaK%7BR%7DI%7DSyHyTqGuUkFkVaE_WwCoWkByWaAaXUgX&sensor=true[/img]
Pray for those who live there. Apparently the air surrounding the explosion has turned toxic as reporters are seen vomiting after standing nearby for a few minutes. Sightings of animal corpses can be seen nearby as well.
Live feed on [url=https://www.reddit.com/r/live/comments/3gsg6r/the_tianjin_explosion_as_reported_by_uop_rah/]reddit[/url]

Miss Silabsoft:

13 dead my ass, industrial parks such as those are always full of homeless, black society, and prostitutes. of course those will not get tallied in the official number but they are reporting glass being shattered 4km away that number is going to go up 10 fold.

I dont think blacks live in Asia
